tool_description: API generates random person informations. Just like Lorem ipsum but for people
name: People
title: People

api_list.name: Specific Person
api_list.description:
Gets specific person by id
If person does not exists it creates a new one
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://people6.p.rapidapi.com/people/12345"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "people6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://people6.p.rapidapi.com/people/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "people6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
